topic: Impact of diverse perspectives on innovation in the energy sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that surprises often arise from unexamined biases and assumptions. To address this, my next step is to actively seek out diverse perspectives and challenge my current beliefs through deliberate exposure to new ideas or environments. This approach will help identify blind spots and foster a mindset more open to unexpected insights and discoveries.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
